+aWh2W: Enable automatic message translations in channels using AI.
E4E4f5: Enable translation of system messages. When disabled, only user messages will be translated.
Xr2Ki0: Select which bot will handle message translations.
Zs/vXT: To report a bug or to provide feedback, <link>create a new issue in the plugin repository</link>.
rEMl/m: Comma-separated list of language codes to translate messages to (e.g. "en,es,fr"). Default is "en".
